key.name: custom-icon
key.description: The location of the image file used as the icon for the object's button. If empty, the default icon for the menu will be used.

key.name: menu-path
key.description: The path from which the menu contents is constructed. If empty, the menu will be the default applications menu.

key.name: tooltip
key.description: The text to display in a tooltip for this menu.
